list_definition.definition: a word by which a person, place or thing is called

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She knows all the flowers by name.
He has a name for honesty.

list_definition.definition: to speak of or list by name

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He could name all the kings of England.
